info.title: Ent Schema API

get.description: List AuthStates.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: item count to render per page

post.description: Creates a new AuthStates and persists it to storage.

get.description: Finds the AuthStates with the requested ID and returns it.

200.description: AuthStates with requested ID was found

delete.description: Deletes the AuthStates with the requested ID.

204.description: AuthStates with requested ID was deleted

patch.description: Updates a AuthStates and persists changes to storage.
